I'm so glad I took the time to leave comments here.  
It's sure proved to be helpful seeing as how everyone's offered suggestions and possible answers including the uploader.  Oh wait... that never happened!

@DieHardNinja  It's pretty simple.  First install the program by launching the AVSVideoEditor.exe.  After that, you need to open the RAR file which will contain 3 folders, one for each AVS function (capture, editor and recorder).  These are the cracked files. 

Open your windows explorer and find where you installed the AVS program (C:\Program Files\AVS4YOU).  Find the matching folders compared to the folders you found in the RAR file.  Copy all the files in your cracked folders and paste them over the ones in the AVS directories.  These are EXEs, DLLs and SIL files.  Once you have replaced the AVS files with the cracked ones in each of the folders, you can start the program up.  It's now CRACKED!
